{"id":398581938,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1600660273,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/398581938/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"13.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int l_max = 0, r_max = 0;\n        int n = height.size();\n        int l = 0, r = n - 1;\n        int ans = 0;\n        while (l < r) {             \n            if (height[l] > l_max) {\n                l_max = height[l];\n            }\n            if (height[r] > r_max) {\n                r_max = height[r];\n            }\n            if (l_max < r_max) {\n                // 放心计算左边\n                ans += max(0, l_max - height[l]);\n                ++l;\n            } else {\n                // 放心计算右边\n                ans += max(0, r_max - height[r]);\n                --r;                \n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
